snippet.title: Undead Darlings ~no cure for love~ Trailer
snippet.description:
As Reggie, talk with and learn about your various travel companions through visual novel-style dialogue sequences replete with player dialogue choices that will shift the direction of the conversation, sometimes in rather unexpected directions. You are tasked with delivering the cure to the zombie outbreak somewhere safe, but finding safety means exploring dangerous dungeons stuffed with enemies to be defeated in a classic turn-based combat system with new-fangled tweaks!


Grow close to specific characters to unlock special character scenes with beautiful anime-style CGs and access their specific endings!


Official Site:  https://sekai.games/game/undead-darlings-no-cure-for-love/

Nintendo Page: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/undead-darlings-no-cure-for-love-switch/
